knimeNode.name: Extract Color
knimeNode.shortDescription: Extract color information (RGB) from a color model.

intro.p: Extract color information (RGB) from a color model. Each color value as defined in the "Color Manager" node will be represented by a data row in the node's output table. The columns represent the different color values for red (R), green (G), blue (B) and alpha (A) -- all in the range of 0-255. The last column (RGBA) is the bitwise concatenation (Bits 24-31 are alpha, 16-23 are red, 8-15 are green, 0-7 are blue).

ports.inPort: The output of the Color Manager node.
ports.outPort: The model represented as a table.
